title: We have plenty of other suitors if Zurich jilts us, RSA boss warns
text:
Welcome to your preview of The Times Subscribe now We have plenty of other suitors if Zurich jilts us, RSA boss warns Stephen Hester says a bid for RSA now would be opportunistic Peter Nicholls/The Times Katherine Griffiths Banking Editor Published at 12:01AM, August 7 2015 
RSA could find plenty of other suitors if Zurich walks away, said Stephen Hester, its chief executive. 
The British company, which is more than 300 years old and once insured the home of Captain James Cook, has a bright future as an independent, Mr Hester said, adding that Zurich would not be the only one interested in the business if a decision was taken to sell.
